import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade' import { connect } from 'react-redux' class ContactInformation extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { states: [], address: "", unit: "", city: "", state: "", zipcode: "", } } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } togglePhoneNumbers() { console.log("IN") console.log(document.getElementById("editPhoneNumbers").style.display == "none") if (document.getElementById("editPhoneNumbers").style.display == "none") { document.getElementById("editPhoneNumbers").style.display = "block" } else { document.getElementById("editPhoneNumbers").style.display = "none" } } componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:8080/getStates").then(response => { const temp = response.data.map(st => { return }) this.setState({ states: temp }) }) } render() { const cInfo = this.props.editUser && this.props.editUser.user && this.props.editUser.user.contactInformation const pNum = this.props.editUser && this.props.editUser.user && this.props.editUser.user.phone const phoneList = pNum && pNum.map(number => { return }) const addressList = cInfo && cInfo.map(item => { return }) return (
Add new Address Below
); } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ editUser: state.temp.editUser, editUserType: state.temp.editUserType }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {})(ContactInformation);
